trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sonora
There were no other sightings in Sonora on or around July 2nd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsA LARGE BRIGHT WHITE LIGHT MOVING FROM NNW TO SE . I THOUGHT IT MIGHT BE THE SPACE STATION OR THE SPACE SHUTTLE, BUT THE LIGHT I WAS SEEING WAS NOT THE BRIGHT REFLECTION I USUALLY SEE. THE LIGHT WAS OVAL POSSIBLY2 TO 3 LIGHTS CLOSE TOGETHER,VERY BRIGHT WHITE CRUISING, NO NOISE OF ANY ENGINES ECT. IT WAS BIGGER THAN A STANDARD PASSENGER JET, THAT I SEE ALL THE TIME AND WAS NOT ON THE USUAL FLIGHT PATH. IT JUST KEPT CRUISING FOR ABOUT 3 MIN TILLIT WENT OUT OF SIGHT MOVING OVER THE TREE LINE TOWARD MERCED AREA.
Summary: SUPER BRIGHT WHITE LIGHT,NO BLINKING LIGHTS..NO SOUND
